name: goodreads_scrape_list
description: Scrape a Goodreads list. Returns books with titles, authors, ratings, and scores.

steps.code: const listTitle = document.querySelector('h1')?.textContent?.trim()||''; const books = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('table.tableList tr, [class*="BookListItem"]')).slice(0,50).map((row,i) => { const t = row.querySelector('a.bookTitle, a[href*="/book/show/"]'); const a = row.querySelector('a.authorName, a[href*="/author/"]'); const r = row.querySelector('[class*="minirating"]'); return { rank: i+1, title: t?t.textContent.trim():'', url: t?t.href:'', author: a?a.textContent.trim():'', rating: r?r.textContent.trim():'' }; }).filter(b=>b.title); return { list_title: listTitle, books, url: window.location.href }
